channel.title: Papers with Code: Trending (unofficial)
channel.description: As a disclaimer, this is an unofficial feed and has no affiliation with Papers with Code.

item.title: GLM-130B: An Open Bilingual Pre-trained Model
item.description: We introduce GLM-130B, a bilingual (English and Chinese) pre-trained language model with 130 billion parameters.

item.title: HyperReel: High-Fidelity 6-DoF Video with Ray-Conditioned Sampling
item.description: Volumetric scene representations enable photorealistic view synthesis for static scenes and form the basis of several existing 6-DoF video techniques.

item.title: Muse: Text-To-Image Generation via Masked Generative Transformers
item.description: Compared to pixel-space diffusion models, such as Imagen and DALL-E 2, Muse is significantly more efficient due to the use of discrete tokens and requiring fewer sampling iterations; compared to autoregressive models, such as Parti, Muse is more efficient due to the use of parallel decoding.

item.title: Attention Is All You Need
item.description: The dominant sequence transduction models are based on complex recurrent or convolutional neural networks in an encoder-decoder configuration.

item.title: Box2Mask: Box-supervised Instance Segmentation via Level-set Evolution
item.description: In contrast to fully supervised methods using pixel-wise mask labels, box-supervised instance segmentation takes advantage of simple box annotations, which has recently attracted increasing research attention.

item.title: ConvNeXt V2: Co-designing and Scaling ConvNets with Masked Autoencoders
item.description: This co-design of self-supervised learning techniques and architectural improvement results in a new model family called ConvNeXt V2, which significantly improves the performance of pure ConvNets on various recognition benchmarks, including ImageNet classification, COCO detection, and ADE20K segmentation.

item.title: PACO: Parts and Attributes of Common Objects
item.description: This motivates the need for large datasets which go beyond traditional object masks and provide richer annotations such as part masks and attributes.

item.title: Reasoning over Different Types of Knowledge Graphs: Static, Temporal and Multi-Modal
item.description: The early works in this domain mainly focus on static KGR and tend to directly apply general knowledge graph embedding models to the reasoning task.

item.title: DynaGAN: Dynamic Few-shot Adaptation of GANs to Multiple Domains
item.description: In this paper, we propose DynaGAN, a novel few-shot domain-adaptation method for multiple target domains.

item.title: Colossal-AI: A Unified Deep Learning System For Large-Scale Parallel Training
item.description: The success of Transformer models has pushed the deep learning model scale to billions of parameters.

item.title: Red Teaming Language Models to Reduce Harms: Methods, Scaling Behaviors, and Lessons Learned
item.description: We provide our own analysis of the data and find a variety of harmful outputs, which range from offensive language to more subtly harmful non-violent unethical outputs.

item.title: GPT Takes the Bar Exam
item.description: Nearly all jurisdictions in the United States require a professional license exam, commonly referred to as "the Bar Exam," as a precondition for law practice.

item.title: Cramming: Training a Language Model on a Single GPU in One Day
item.description: Recent trends in language modeling have focused on increasing performance through scaling, and have resulted in an environment where training language models is out of reach for most researchers and practitioners.

item.title: unilm
item.description: Large-scale Self-supervised Pre-training Across Tasks, Languages, and Modalities

item.title: ALIKE: Accurate and Lightweight Keypoint Detection and Descriptor Extraction
item.description: The reprojection loss is then proposed to directly optimize these sub-pixel keypoints, and the dispersity peak loss is presented for accurate keypoints regularization.

item.title: Point-E: A System for Generating 3D Point Clouds from Complex Prompts
item.description: This is in stark contrast to state-of-the-art generative image models, which produce samples in a number of seconds or minutes.

item.title: CiT: Curation in Training for Effective Vision-Language Data
item.description: Large vision-language models are generally applicable to many downstream tasks, but come at an exorbitant training cost that only large institutions can afford.

item.title: Text2Poster: Laying out Stylized Texts on Retrieved Images
item.description: Poster generation is a significant task for a wide range of applications, which is often time-consuming and requires lots of manual editing and artistic experience.

item.title: Silent Killer: Optimizing Backdoor Trigger Yields a Stealthy and Powerful Data Poisoning Attack
item.description: In contrast to previous attacks, both the poison and the trigger in our method are stealthy.

item.title: Cross Modal Transformer via Coordinates Encoding for 3D Object Dectection
item.description: In this paper, we propose a robust 3D detector, named Cross Modal Transformer (CMT), for end-to-end 3D multi-modal detection.
